message: Let's split it evenly to get this over with!
I'll take the majority, but it's still a decent offer
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
I'll take a bigger share, but I'm willing to give you a small chance
I'm getting desperate, but I still want a decent share. Meet me in the middle?
I'm taking control, don't expect mercy
I'm running out of options, but I'm not giving up completely. Take what you want, but I'll take what I can get.
I'm almost there, don't stand in my way
I'm out of options. Take the rest, I'm done.
